thread.title: Amanda Parsons
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Amanda Parsons

author: Amanda Parsons
title: Amanda Parsons
text: I went to Town Fair Tire after a local dealership told me I needed new tires due to two broken tire belts. Town Fair Tire offered the most competitive price in Keene (and I contacted four other businesses in the area as well) and the best package price. Instead of making money on selling me a new set of tires, they told me I didn't need the tires just an alignment, tire rotation, and tire balancing. This was also an affordable package. The guys at the front desk were great and I appreciated their honesty. I will absolutely be getting my next set of tires at Town Fair Tire!
